text: Moncreiffe House: the current building Moncreiffe House is a country house near Bridge of Earn in Perthshire in Scotland. It is a category B listed building. ==History== The original house The original house was designed by Sir William Bruce in the classical style for Sir Thomas Moncreiffe, 1st Baronet and was completed in 1679. It was the headquarters of the Polish I Corps, which was formed under Scottish Command in September 1940, during the Second World War.
